name: kingston-newcomer-pathways
description: Hackathon MVP: guided municipal service navigation assistant for Kingston newcomers

scripts.install:all: npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend install
scripts.dev: node scripts/kill-ports.js && concurrently "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm --prefix backend start" "npm --prefix frontend run preview"
